alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 8:05PM EST until January 10 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern Adirondacks and southern Green Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will change to mixed precipitation by later this evening, then to plain rain by early Wednesday morning as temperature rise above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren
